column1: This is the wrong move especially at a time when we are beginning to see Covid cases falling and social distancing/mask wearing working. It is critical for people to be tested if they have come in contact with a Covid positive person. https://t.co/5jgPziMf1M

Votes have been occurring remotely for several months now with no adverse consequences. Given the recent COVID-19 positive test results for my colleagues including Louie Gohmert today this method of voting is the prudent and rational course of action. (2/3)

I’m deeply concerned the Ortega regime in #Nicaragua continues to cover up impact of COVID-19 within its borders. I urge full cooperation w/medical experts to mitigate the devastating effects of this virus & support the well-being of the Nicaraguan people https://t.co/GUPO91YAQF

The postal service must adapt to changing markets. In 2019 the USPS lost over $8 billion dollars so COVID-19 is not the underlying problem for them. The USPS should adjust pricing eliminate o.t. adjust delivery schedules & eliminate subsidies to compete https://t.co/nNDafbGTd1
